products.name: HI-VIS REF Jacket
products.description1: Stay protected and visible on job sites with this high-visibility, water-resistant safety jacket. Ideal for construction, roadside assistance, and industrial environments.
bullets: ANSI/ISEA 107 Class 3 compliant for maximum visibility
High-contrast fluorescent yellow with reflective striping
Water and wind resistant outer shell
Front zip closure with storm flap
Inner thermal lining for cold weather protection
Multiple utility pockets for storage
Elastic cuffs and waist for secure fit
Reinforced stitching for durability
products.description2: Engineered for the toughest conditions, this safety jacket ensures visibility in low-light and high-risk environments. Designed with reflective taping and bright neon fabric, it enhances worker safety while maintaining comfort. The thermal inner lining keeps you warm during cold shifts, while the durable construction stands up to daily wear on demanding job sites.
materialCare: Outer Material: 100% Polyester with PU coating
Inner Lining: Quilted polyester thermal insulation
Machine wash cold with like colors

products.name: Alumi Heat-RES Suit

bullets: Reflective aluminized outer shell for high heat resistance
Full body coverage including hood, gloves, and boot covers

Adjustable fit for ease of movement and comfort
Ideal for foundries, metalwork, and firefighting environments
Tested to meet EN and NFPA standards
Durable stitching and reinforced seams for longevity
products.description2: Engineered for maximum thermal protection, this aluminized suit is essential for professionals exposed to high-temperature environments. With its reflective surface and insulating layers, it offers reliable defense against radiant heat and molten splash.
materialCare: Do not machine wash – spot clean with damp cloth
Avoid using harsh detergents or bleach
Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight
Do not iron or tumble dry
Inspect before each use for wear and tear
Ensure all closures are secured before use

products.name: Safety Helmet Chin Strap
products.description1: This industrial safety helmet is engineered for head protection in construction and industrial environments. Available in yellow, white, and blue, it comes with a secure chin strap and ventilation slots for maximum safety and comfort.
bullets: High-impact ABS shell for superior protection
Adjustable 4-point chin strap for secure fit
Ventilation slots for airflow and reduced heat buildup
Available in yellow, white, and blue colors
Comfortable interior padding with sweatband
Lightweight design for all-day wear
Ideal for construction, utility, and industrial workers
Compatible with earmuffs and face shields
products.description2: Designed to meet rigorous safety standards, this helmet offers both comfort and protection on the job site. Its robust build and practical design make it a trusted choice for professionals in high-risk work zones.
materialCare: Clean with mild soap and water
Do not use strong chemicals or abrasives
Store in a cool, dry place away from sunlight
Inspect straps and shell regularly for damage
Replace after significant impact or every 5 years

products.name: PIP Safety Helmet
products.description1: Engineered for optimal head protection, this PIP safety helmet features the advanced MIPS (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) technology. Designed to reduce rotational motion during angled impacts, it ensures maximum safety and comfort for industrial and construction environments.
bullets: MIPS technology reduces rotational impact forces
Durable ABS shell for high-impact protection
6-point suspension system for superior comfort
Integrated sweatband and ventilation holes
Adjustable chin strap with secure buckle
Red quick-release tabs for easy access and removal
Ideal for construction, utility, and rescue operations
Modern design with secure rear adjustment dial
products.description2: This helmet sets a new standard for industrial headgear, combining safety, ergonomics, and modern technology. Ideal for professionals who prioritize comfort and protection during demanding tasks.
materialCare: Inner liner: MIPS low-friction layer and EPS foam
Do not submerge in water or use harsh chemicals
Avoid prolonged exposure to extreme heat
Inspect suspension and MIPS liner regularly
Replace after significant impact or damage
Store in a cool, dry place

products.name: DUA-VIS Helmet
products.description1: This premium industrial safety helmet offers enhanced head protection with a dual visor system—one tinted for sunlight and one clear for debris—making it ideal for construction, electrical, and emergency work. It features a high-impact ABS shell, integrated chin strap, and breathable internal padding for all-day wear.
bullets: High-impact ABS outer shell for robust protection
Dual integrated visors: clear and tinted for versatile use
Adjustable 4-point chin strap with quick-release buckle
Internal suspension system for shock absorption
Ventilation slots for airflow and comfort
Sweatband and padded head cradle for extended use
Reflective tape (on select models) for enhanced visibility
Ideal for construction, industrial, utility, and rescue operations
products.description2: Engineered for professionals who require reliable headgear across variable environments, this helmet features dual visors for sunlight and debris protection, ensuring visibility and safety during critical tasks. The ergonomic design enhances comfort, even during long shifts.
materialCare: Clean with mild soap and water
Do not use solvents or abrasive cleaners
Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
Inspect regularly for cracks or wear
